metadata.title: CVE-2019-25043 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ModSecurity 3.x before 3.0.4 mishandles key-value pair parsing, as demonstrated by a "string index out of range" error and worker-process crash for a "Cookie: =abc" header.

criterions.comment: modsecurity package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
